trans: 【名】 （All）（英、美、巴、加）奥尔（人名）
adj. 全部的；每一个的；任何的；尽可能多的；全然是……的，完全表现出……的；（某一体征）显著突出的
pron. 所有，全部；唯一
adv. 完全地；各方，各选手；非常，太
n. 全部，所有
det. 全部；每一个；极度，尽量；无论什么，任何；唯一，仅仅

sentences.english: There is built-in storage space in all bedrooms.
sentences.chinese: 所有卧室里都有内置储藏空间。

sentences.english: the restaurant that Hugh and all his friends go to
sentences.chinese: 休和他所有的朋友们去的那家饭馆

detailed_translations.english: the whole of an amount, thing, or type of thing
the whole of a particular group or thing or to everyone or everything of a particular kind

name: our
trans: det. 我们的

sentences.chinese: 他们分享我们的胜利。

sentences.english: She spread our lunch on the grass.
sentences.chinese: 她在草地上摆好了我们的午饭。

sentences.english: We avenged ourselves on  our enemy.
sentences.chinese: 我们向我们的敌人报仇。

name: university
trans: n. 大学，综合性大学；大学校舍

sentences.english: He teaches Esperanto at that university.
sentences.chinese: 他在那所大学教世界语。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.english: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

detailed_translations.english: an educational institution at the highest level, where you study for a degree

name: course
trans: v. 奔流，快速流动；（感情、思想）涌动；（用猎犬）追踪（兔子）
n. 课程；过程；道路，航线；进程，进展；方针，总方向；行动方式，处理方法；疗程；一道菜；比赛场地；（砖、石等墙的）层；（常sing.）追踪狩猎（尤指野兔）；横帆；一组同音弦；追踪狩猎（尤指野兔）

sentences.english: Andy’s doing a one-year journalism course.
sentences.chinese: 安迪正在修读为期一年的新闻课程。

sentences.english: During the course of our conversation, it emerged that Bob had been in prison.
sentences.chinese: 我们在谈话过程中得知鲍勃坐过牢。

sentences.english: We had fish for the main course.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主菜是鱼。

detailed_translations.english: a series of lessons in a particular subject

name: we
trans: n. （We）人名；（缅）韦
pron. 我们（主格）；笔者，本人（作者或演讲人使用）；朕，寡人

sentences.english: ‘Did you go into the supermarket?’ ‘No, we didn’t.’
sentences.chinese: “你们进超级市场了吗？”“我们没有进去。”

sentences.english: Shall we stop for a coffee?
sentences.chinese: 我们停下来喝杯咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: So we all travelled down to Brighton together.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们一起都去了布赖顿。

sentences.english: We declare our support for a government of national unity.
sentences.chinese: 我们宣布支持一个全国统一的政府。

sentences.english: We Italians are proud of our history.
sentences.chinese: 我们意大利人为自己的历史感到自豪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 我们（主格）；笔者，本人（作者或演讲人使用）；朕，寡人
detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people

name: many
trans: adv. 多
adj. 许多的
pron. 许多；许多人
det. 许多；（与单数名词及动词连用）许多，大量
n. 大多数人（the many）
【名】 （Many）（美、法、加、印）马尼（人名）

sentences.chinese: 在他的众多爱好中有饲养名马。

sentences.english: The printing press gave power to a few to change the world for the many.
sentences.chinese: 印刷机赋予了少数人为多数人改变世界的力量。

sentences.english: Not many expected Ferdinand to be such a success this season.
sentences.chinese: 预料到费迪南德在本赛季如此成功的人并不多。

detailed_translations.english: a large number of people or things
many people

name: more
trans: adv. 更；（程度上）更强，更多；继续，再；又一次；还有，再者；额外地；更像（前者）地
pron. （数、量等）更多的，更大的（much、a lot of 和 many 的比较级）；多了的部分
det. （数、量等）更多的，更大的（much、a lot of 和 many 的比较级）；另外的，附加的
adj. 更多的，更大的；额外的
【名】 【名】（More）人名；（英、法）莫尔；（意、西、以）莫雷

sentences.english: I have no more questions.
sentences.chinese: 我没问题了。

sentences.english: The film deserves more attention from the public.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片应受到公众的更多注意。

sentences.english: The accident taught him to be more careful.
sentences.chinese: 这起事故的教训使他变得更小心。

detailed_translations.english: a greater amount or number
having a particular quality to a greater degree

name: been
trans: v. 是，有（be的过去分词）
n. (Been) （美）贝恩（人名）

name: study
trans: 【名】 （Study）（英）斯塔迪 （人名）
v. 学习，攻读；认真阅读，仔细看；研究，调查；<西印度>仔细考虑，慎重思考；（演员）记住（或背下）（台词）
n. （专题）研究，调查；（尤指通过书本的）学习，攻读；用于某些学科名称（studies）；功课，课业，学业（studies）；学术专著，专题论文；<美>学习者；学习对象，研究对象；（绘画的）试画， 习作；书房，书斋；细致考虑，仔细检查，审视； 特别的事物（或人）；以特定速度背台词的演员（舞台俚语）；描写，描绘；练习曲

sentences.english: Recent studies show that women still get paid a lot less than men.
sentences.chinese: 最近的调查表明，女性的薪水仍比男性的要低很多。

sentences.english: The study was carried out between January and May 2008.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究是在 2008 年1月到5月间进行的。

sentences.english: Set aside a period of time specifically for study.
sentences.chinese: 留出一段时间专门用于学习

sentences.english: I’ve been studying English for six years
sentences.chinese: 我学英语已有六年了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 研究 (对某一课题或问题的)；中文释义: 学习 (尤指在家里或放学后的)
detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that is done to find out more about a particular subject or problem, and usually includes a written report

detailed_translations.chinese: 中文释义: 学习，攻读
detailed_translations.english: to learn about a subject at school, university etc

name: must
trans: aux. （表示必要或很重要）必须；（用于表示肯定推测）一定，谅必；（提出建议）应该；（用于表示意图）一定要，坚持要；（用于表示同情）必定；（用于问句中表示生气）非要 ；（用于感叹句，表示惊讶或震惊）一定是
n. <非正式>必不可少的事物；（发酵前或发酵中的）葡萄汁；潮气，霉菌；（尤指发情期的公象、雄骆驼等的）狂暴状态（=musth）
【名】 （Must）（美）穆斯特（人名）

sentences.english: All passengers must wear seat belts.
sentences.chinese: 所有乘客都必须系安全带。

sentences.english: It’s getting late. I really must go.
sentences.chinese: 天晚了，我真的必须走了。

sentences.english: You must work hard.
sentences.chinese: 你必须努力工作。

sentences.english: We must all be patient.
sentences.chinese: 我们都必须耐心。

sentences.english: Must I pay now?
sentences.chinese: 我必须现在付款吗？

sentences.english: For the engine to work, the green lever must be in the ‘up’ position.
sentences.chinese: 要启动引擎，绿色操纵杆必须在“上”这一挡。

sentences.english: Accidents must be reported to the safety officer.
sentences.chinese: 出了事故必须向安全员报告。

detailed_translations.english: to have to do something because it is necessary or important, or because of a law or order

name: work
trans: n. 工作，职业；劳动，活计；职责，工作内容；作品，著作；工作成果，作为；工作地点，工作时间；工作所需的材料（或档案等）；（机器的）活动部件（the works）；<非正式>所有东西，全套物品（the works）；土木工程，建筑（works）；工厂（works）；善行，德行（works）；防御工事；（物理学）功；<非正式>整形手术
v. 工作，干活儿；从事体力（或脑力）劳动；从事……工作，在……工作；努力取得，力争；运转，运行；开动，操作（机器、装置等）；奏效，成功；产生……作用；（使）变成，逐步移动；（使）（身体某部位）抽动；（用某种材料）画画，创作；使成形，加工；博得，赢得（众人的支持或欢心）；<美>计算，算出；思考，动脑筋；以（某种假定或思想）为基础（或前提）；<非正式>安排；耕种；开采（矿）
adj. 工作的，与工作有关的；适合工作时穿戴的；用于工作的
【名】 （Work）（英、埃塞、丹、冰、美）沃克（人名）

sentences.english: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.
sentences.chinese: 他失业有两年了。

sentences.english: More people are in work (= have a job ) than ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money

detailed_translations.chinese: 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进

name: new
trans: n. 新东西，新事物（the new）
adv. （用于构成复合词）新的，新近的
adj. 新出现的，新兴的；新买的；未用过的，崭新的；有别于从前的，新颖的；新发现的，新近知道的；生疏的，未体验过的；现代的，最新型的；新时期的，新开始的；富有朝气的，生气勃勃的；时鲜的（蔬菜）；更新的，变样的
【名】 （New）（英）纽（人名）

sentences.english: the new issue of ‘Time’ magazine
sentences.chinese: 新一期《时代周刊》

sentences.english: new products on the market

sentences.english: The hardest part of this job is understanding the new technology.
sentences.chinese: 这项工作最难的地方是理解新技术。

sentences.english: a young man with new ideas

detailed_translations.english: recently made, built, invented, written, designed etc

name: there
trans: adv. 在那里；在那边；在那点上
int. 你瞧
n. 那个地方

sentences.chinese: 我们可以回到我的小屋去吃午饭。

sentences.chinese: 苏格兰？我一直想去那儿。

sentences.chinese: 就站在那里，不要动。

sentences.chinese: 你能把那个葡萄酒杯递给我吗？

sentences.chinese: 看，那就是我跟你说过的那家书店。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在那里；在那边；在那点上

used to express satisfaction that you have been proved right or that you have done what you intended to do

name: should
trans: v. （用于纠正别人）应该；（用于建议）该，可以；（表示预期）应该会；（表示与预期相反）本应；（与 I 或 we 连用代替 would，表示虚拟结果）就将；（用于 that 从句，表示建议或安排）可以；（用于 that 从句，表示感情）竟然会；（表示拒绝、恼怒或惊奇）竟会；（表示可能）假如，万一；将（用作 shall 的过去式）；（与 I 和 we 连用，表示客气地请求）想；当然，真的（用于强调自己所相信或所期待的）；（表示强调有趣、惊讶或印象深刻）真该

sentences.english: He shouldn’t be so selfish.
sentences.chinese: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.english: Why should anyone want to marry Tony?
sentences.chinese: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

n. 讲座，讲课，演讲；训斥，告诫

sentences.chinese: 他经常讲授法国现代文学课程。

sentences.english: He lectures on European art at Manchester University.
sentences.chinese: 他在曼彻斯特大学讲授欧洲艺术。

to talk to a group of people on a particular subject, especially to students in a university

name: people
trans: n. 人，人类；人们，大家（the people）；平民，老百姓（the people）；民族，种族（peoples）；（具有共同品质、兴趣等的）人员，团体；与某人有联系的人们（one's people）；<美，非正式>各位，诸位；<美>（审判中的）公诉人（the People）
v. 居住在，定居于；充满，充斥着（某种类型的人）

sentences.english: How many people were at the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人到会？

sentences.english: At least 40 people were killed.
sentences.chinese: 至少有40人遇害。

sentences.english: He pledged that he would never lie to the American people.
sentences.chinese: 他保证绝不对美国人民撒谎。

detailed_translations.english: used as the plural of ‘person’ to refer to men, women, and children

name: not
trans: adv. 表示否定，不
n. “非”（计算机中逻辑运算的一种）

sentences.english: Most of the stores do not open until 10 am.
sentences.chinese: 大多数商店要到上午10点才开始营业。

sentences.english: She’s not a very nice person.
sentences.chinese: 她为人不太好。

sentences.english: You were wrong not to inform the police.
sentences.chinese: 你没有通知警方是错误的。

sentences.english: ‘Can we go to the park?’ ‘No, not today, dear.’
sentences.chinese: “我们能去公园吗？”“不，今天不行，亲爱的。”

detailed_translations.english: used to make a word, statement, or question negative

name: please
trans: int. 好吗，请（用于客气地请求）；请千万，请务必（用于加强请求的语气）；行，谢谢（用于接受别人的好意）；请别，请不要；得了吧；让我说
v. （使）开心，（使）满意；想，选择，喜欢；请便，随你的便

sentences.english: a business that wants to please its customers
sentences.chinese: 希望让顾客满意的一家公司

sentences.english: She did everything she could to please him.
sentences.chinese: 她千方百计讨好他。

sentences.english: Most children are eager to please .
sentences.chinese: 大多数孩子都渴望取悦别人。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone happy or satisfied

name: as
trans: adv. （程度或数量上）同样，一样；例如，诸如
prep. 作为；以……身份；当作；像，如同；当……时
conj. 像……一样；（说明某事应完成的时间或发生的频率）；照……方式，和……一样；正如，如同；当……时候，在……时候；虽然，尽管；因为，由于；（关系）就像，相当于；以至于（与so或such连用表结果）

sentences.english: I saw Peter as I was getting off the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我下公共汽车的时候看见了彼得。

sentences.english: As time passed, things seemed to get worse.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，情况似乎变得更加糟糕了。

sentences.english: Just as the two men were leaving, a message arrived.
sentences.chinese: 那两个男子刚要离开，消息就传来了。

detailed_translations.english: while or when

name: it
trans: abbr. （IT）信息技术（information technology）
n. （捉迷藏等儿童游戏中的）捉人者，找人者；意大利苦艾酒，味美思酒
pron. 它，这，那（指无生命的东西、动物、植物）；指已提到或将提及的事物、活动、经验、抽象观念等；在不分性别或情况不详时指代；作无人称动词的主语，表示天气、时日、距离、状态、温度等；用于替代通常出现在其后面的名词、短语或从句；用于强调其后的句子成分；用于指某人；用作直接宾语，几乎不具有或完全不具有任何含义；能力，素质

sentences.english: ‘Where’s your office?’ ‘It’s on the third floor.’
sentences.chinese: “你的办公室在哪儿？”“在三楼。”

sentences.english: I love the spring – it’s a wonderful time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢春季——这是一年里最美妙的时节。

sentences.english: There were people crying, buildings on fire. It was terrible!
sentences.chinese: 有人在哭喊，楼房在燃烧―太可怕了！

sentences.english: Don’t blame me. It wasn’t my idea.
sentences.chinese: 不要责备我，这不是我的主意。

sentences.english: This little beast is a lemur and it lives in Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 这小动物是狐猴，生活在马达加斯加。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a thing, animal, situation, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about

name: at
trans: prep. 在（表示存在或出现的地点、场所、位置、空间）；在……岁时；在……远；以（某种价格、速度等）；向，朝；处于……状态；处于最佳（或最差等）状态；达；因为；在……方面；响应；忙于；（武器）瞄准；用，以；（抓）住；从事于；冲（某人……）
abbr. 密封的（airtight）；大气（atmosphere）；原子的（atomic）；气温（air temperature）
n. 阿特（老挝货币基本单位att）；砹（极不稳定放射性元素）

sentences.english: They live at 18 Victoria Street.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在维多利亚街18 号。

sentences.english: Does this train stop at Preston?
sentences.chinese: 这列火车在普雷斯顿停吗？

sentences.english: I was waiting at the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 我在公共汽车站等着。

sentences.english: Liz and her friend sat down at a corner table.
sentences.chinese: 莉兹和她的朋友在靠角落的一张桌子旁坐下。

sentences.english: Turn left at the church.
sentences.chinese: 在教堂那里朝左转。

sentences.english: We’ll meet at Harry’s (=  at Harry’s house  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们将在哈里家碰头。

sentences.english: I spent an unpleasant hour at the dentist’s.
sentences.chinese: 我在牙医诊所度过了难熬的一小时。

sentences.english: The film starts at 8 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 电影8点钟开始。

detailed_translations.english: used to say exactly where something or someone is, or where something happens

n. 精神压力，紧张；压力，应力；强调，重要性；（单词）重音，重读，（音乐）加强音；压强；环境恶劣引起的疾病

adj. 夜晚的；夜晚使用的；夜间进行的；夜晚活动的

sentences.chinese: 天色转暗，开始下起冰冷的雨来。

name: involved
trans: v. 牵涉，包含（involve 的过去式和过去分词形式）
adj. 复杂的；与……关系密切的；专心于……的，忙于……的；卷入的，参与的

sentences.chinese: 情节太复杂，几乎没人知道是怎么回事。

adj. 神秘的，身份不明的

sentences.english: Twenty years after the event, his death remains a mystery .
sentences.chinese: 事情过去二十年了，他的死仍然是个谜。

sentences.english: The way her mind worked was always a mystery to him.
sentences.chinese: 她脑子里在想些什么对他来说始终是个谜。

sentences.english: ‘Why did he do it?’ ‘I don’t know. It’s a complete mystery .’
sentences.chinese: “他为什么这么做？” “我不知道，这完全是个谜。”

sentences.english: The police never solved the mystery of Gray’s disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 警察一直没有侦破格雷失踪的谜案。

sentences.english: But why would anyone want to kill Jack? The mystery deepened .
sentences.chinese: 但为什么会有人想杀死杰克呢？疑团越来越深了。

sentences.english: What happened to the paintings after that is an unsolved mystery .
sentences.chinese: 后来那些画的命运如何是个不解之谜。

sentences.english: I don’t know how he got the job – it’s one of life’s little mysteries .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他是怎么得到那份工作的——那永远是个小小的谜。

sentences.english: How life began on Earth is one of the great mysteries of science.
sentences.chinese: 地球生命的起源是一大科学谜团。

trans: n. 惊讶，惊叹；奇观，奇迹；令人惊讶的事物，令人难以置信的事物；能人，奇才，有特效的东西
【名】 （Wonder）（美）旺德（人名）
v. 想知道，好奇，琢磨；不知是否（用于提问或礼貌地提出请求）；感到疑惑，（对…）感到不安；感到惊讶，觉得惊奇
adj. 极好的，灵验的

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

name: refer
trans: v. 提到，谈及（refer to）；描述，涉及（refer to）；查阅，参考（refer to）；将……送交给（以求获得帮助等）；让（某人）注意；<古>把……归因于；（考试中）淘汰（应试者）

sentences.chinese: 在他的讲话中，他提到了最近的加拿大之行。

v. （小心地）放置；嵌入（表面）；（电影、戏剧、故事等）以……为背景（set 的现在分词形式）

n. 手；（钟表的）指针；一局牌，一手牌；帮助，援手；工人；船员，水手；支配，掌管；作用，影响；鼓掌，拍手喝彩；<文>字迹；一手之宽（用来测量马匹的高度）；<旧>（女方的）允婚；表演艺人，制作工匠

sentences.chinese: 她手中拿着的是一张破旧的老照片。

trans: adj. 重复的，反复发生的
v. 重说，重写；重做；重演（repeat 的过去式及过去分词形式）

sentences.chinese: 我核实了我获知那条信息的来源。

sentences.chinese: 他的说法得到了几位证人的证实。

detailed_translations.english: to discover whether something is correct or true

trans: n. 短而尖的声音，咔哒声；点击；（南非语等语言的）倒吸气音
v. （用鼠标）点击；发出咔嗒声；一见如故，受欢迎；突然明白，恍然大悟；配合默契，进展顺利；得到关注，引起兴趣

sentences.english: The door clicked shut behind me.
sentences.chinese: 门在我身后咔嗒一声关上了。

sentences.chinese: 妈妈咂咂嘴，叹了口气。

sentences.chinese: 埃德蒙弹了个响指示意约翰跟着他。

sentences.english: Vogel clicked his heels (= hit the heels of his shoes together ) and bowed.
sentences.chinese: 沃格尔咔嗒一声并拢脚跟，鞠了个躬。

sentences.english: Twist the lever and the gears click into place .
sentences.chinese: 转动变速杆，排挡就咔嗒一声到位了。

sentences.english: You can check your e-mail with a click of your mouse.
sentences.chinese: 通过鼠标的一点你就能查电子邮件。

detailed_translations.english: to make a short hard sound, or make something produce this sound

name: logo
trans: n. （Logo）（美）洛戈（人名）
n. （公司或组织的）标识，徽标

sentences.chinese: …米高梅公司著名的怒吼狂狮标志。

detailed_translations.english: a small design that is the official sign of a company or organization

name: above
trans: adv. （级别或地位上）高于；在（或向）上面，在（或向）较高处；高于，超出（特定数量、比率或标准）；上文，前文
n. 上文提及之事，前文所提之事（the above）
adj. 前文述及的，上述的
prep. （数量或度量）在……以上，超过；在（或向）……上面；（级别或地位上）高于； （重要性、质量）超过，胜过；（因善良或诚实正直而）不至于，不屑于（做某事）；（声音）比……更响亮，盖过；不受……影响，免于；（重要性、质量）超过，胜过

sentences.english: He lived in a flat above the shop.
sentences.chinese: 他住在那商店上面的一套房间里。

sentences.english: The airliner flew above the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 大型客机在云层上面飞行。

sentences.english: The salaries we offer are well above (= much higher than ) average.
sentences.chinese: 我们提供的薪资远高于平均水平。

trans: 【名】 （Enter）（英）恩特（人名）
v. 进入；开始从事，开始做；参加，报名；登记，输入；正式提出；登场
n. 回车键

sentences.chinese: 进来前先敲门。

sentences.english: The rebels were prepared to enter negotiations (= start discussing something ).
sentences.chinese: 叛乱分子愿意参加谈判。

trans: v. 惩罚，处分；训练，管教（discipline 的第三人称单数）

trans: n. 工程，工程学；控制，引导，管理；筹划，出谋划策

v. 设计，建造；策划，精心安排（engineer 
 的现在分词形式）

sentences.chinese: 这座桥是现代工程的一大成就。

sentences.english: a degree in engineering
sentences.chinese: 工程学学位

detailed_translations.english: the activity of applying scientific knowledge to the design, building and control of machines, roads, bridges, electrical equipment, etc.

name: regions
trans: n. 地区；地域；领域；身体部位（region 的复数）

trans: adv. 财政上，金融上

sentences.english: After all, your competitors are financially rational.
sentences.chinese: 至少你的对手财政上是理性的。

sentences.english: And you have to find a way to support yourself financially while you follow your passion.
sentences.chinese: 并且当你跟着你的激情走时，你必须找到一个办法在财政上支持你自己。

sentences.chinese: 我知道当您刚刚来到普林斯顿大学的时候，福布斯集团决定不再支持,大学的财政开支，那时，有一些人,在您的讲座上抗议。

name: up
trans: v. 使…更高，提高；举起，抬起；突然行动
int. （用于命令士兵或动物）起来！起立！
n. （某一阶段的）成功，繁荣；<非正式>走运；在增长，在改善中；（人或企业）诚实守法；蒸蒸日上，越来越成功

adv. 向上，由低向高；到楼上；（太阳）升起；在高处；面朝上，面朝天；从地下到表面，向水面；向北方，朝北方；往（较高或较远的）某处；去，在（更重要的地方，如大城市或大学）；到……的近处，靠近；到前面，朝前面；处于（或进入）直立状态；起床；用劲地，以较大气力；（吐）出来；（强度，音量，活动）由弱到强，由低到高，由轻到响；（列表中）处于更高位置，（议程中）处于更重要的位置；（水平、数量或比率）由低到高；高出，多；向较高地位，向更好的状态；出现，出席；（在品质、知识或成就方面）相等，比得上；一起，聚拢地；紧紧地，牢固地；计划要，被建议，正被考虑；<非正式>愿意做（或参与）；出庭受审的；处于工作（或可用）状态，进入（可用）状态；（在讨论或思考时）引起某人的注意；靠近（某人）；靠近顶端；做完地，完成地；封闭，关闭；成碎片，分成部分；处于活跃期，进入兴奋状态；公开展示地；停下来；每名队员，每个队；（航行）逆风地，逆水地；（舵柄）迎风转舵；（棒球）在场上击球；（长发）向头上（或脑后）梳理的；彻底地，完全地；（时间）到；（道路）正在整修的；<非正式>（尤指异常或不愉快的事情）发生，出现
prep. 往较高处，向较高处；沿着……，顺着……；近顶端；往（河，溪）上游

adj. 在高处；（向上）开；升于地平线之上；冒出地面，冒出水面；在前方，在前面；起床；上涨； (时间) 到点的；（正在）发生，进行，出现；得分领先于（对手），超前于（对手）；正常运行，正常工作，起作用；（在活动中）轮到某人；高兴，兴奋；对……了如指掌的，熟悉的；（道路）正在修整的；（骑师）骑着马的；（物理）（夸克的味）带有+2/3电荷的，上夸克的（质子和中子被认为是由上夸克和下夸克组成）；向上移动的，上行的； （时间）到点的；（时间）终止，结束

sentences.chinese: 我们慢慢地爬上山。

sentences.chinese: 她从地板上捡起外套。

sentences.chinese: 通往山里的小径

sentences.chinese: 蒂姆爬到了树上，以便看得更清楚。

sentences.chinese: 如果知道答案就举手。

sentences.chinese: 水已经没到了我的鼻子。

sentences.chinese: 卡伦仰卧着，盯着天花板。

sentences.english: Are you sure you should be up?

name: reach
trans: n. （臂的）伸出；伸手可及的距离；可到达的距离；（权力或能力）能及的范围；边远地区；层级，层次；河段，直水道；（特定时期内）观众人数，听众人数；（航海）横风行程
【名】  (Reach)(柬)列（人名）
v. 到达，抵达；被看见，被听到；达到（特定的水平或数量）；达到（一个特定的时间或阶段）；（经讨论或思考后）达成，实现；伸，伸手；能伸到，能够到；把……递给；（大或长等）足够达到；（用电话等）与……联系；影响，打动；（航海）横风航驶；为……提供帮助（reach out to）

sentences.chinese: 我们深夜到达伦敦。

sentences.chinese: 她伸手从包里取出一张名片。

sentences.english: Chelsea could reach the final of the European Cup.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西队会进入欧洲杯决赛。

trans: n. 成年，成人时期

adv. 一点，丝毫；<美，非正式>压根儿
adj. 任何的，任一的；一点，一些

det. 任何的，任一的；一点，些许；不寻常的；尽可能多的，所有的

trans: n. 结论，推论；结局，结尾；缔结，商定；（根据所给前提得出的）命题

sentences.chinese: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.chinese: 决不要贸然下结论。

name: sunray

sentences.chinese: 唐娜中学毕业后进了艺术学院。

sentences.english: Some people who want to go to college still can’t get there.
sentences.chinese: 有些想上大学的人仍然无法如愿。

detailed_translations.english: a school for advanced education, especially in a particular profession or skill

name: internal
trans: n. 内部部件，内部特征；内脏
adj. 内部的，体内的；内政的，国内的；本身的，本质的；内心的；<英>（大学生）本校生的

sentences.english: We have no interest in interfering in the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们对干涉其他国家内政不感兴趣。

sentences.chinese: 对国内安全的威胁

sentences.english: There’s to be an internal inquiry into the whole affair.
sentences.chinese: 对整个事件将进行内部调查。

name: website
trans: n. 网站（全球资讯网的主机站）

sentences.chinese: 有关减肥和健康饮食的更多信息，请访问我们的网站。

detailed_translations.english: a place on the Internet where you can find information about something, especially a particular organization

name: agreed
trans: adj. 同意的；通过协议的
v. 同意；赞成（agree 的过去式）

name: consensus
trans: n. 一致看法，共识

sentences.english: The EU Council of Finance Ministers failed to reach a consensus on the pace of integration.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟财政部长会议未能就一体化的进度达成共识。

sentences.chinese: 大家都认为科技是好东西。

sentences.english: the consensus politics of the fifties
sentences.chinese: 50年代的共识政治

detailed_translations.english: an opinion that everyone in a group agrees with or accepts

trans: n. 领导，领导地位；领导才能；领导人员，领导层；领先地位

sentences.english: The US must now take a firm leadership role.
sentences.chinese: 美国现在必须扮演一个强有力的领导人角色。

sentences.chinese: 三门选修课

name: offered

sentences.english: I read your article with great interest.
sentences.chinese: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

sentences.english: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests
sentences.chinese: 为某人的利益游说；保护 / 维护某人的利益

sentences.english: The money was repaid with interest.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱是带息偿还的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you have when you want to know or learn more about sb/sth

name: money
trans: n. 钱，钞票，货币；财产，财富；款项，金额；工资，薪金
【名】 （Money）（英）莫尼，（西、法）莫内（人名）

sentences.english: Don’t spend all your money on the first day of your holiday!
sentences.chinese: 别在度假的第一天就把钱都花完了！

sentences.english: The repairs will cost quite a lot of money.
sentences.chinese: 修理要花一大笔钱。

sentences.english: The family made their money in the woollen trade.
sentences.chinese: 这家人是做毛纺生意赚的钱。

detailed_translations.english: what you earn by working and can use to buy things. Money can be in the form of notes and coins or cheques, and can be kept in a bank

name: lend
trans: v. 借给，借出；贷出，贷（款）；给……增加，增添（特色）；给予，提供（帮助、支持等）；使适合，使易遭受
【名】 （Lend）（德）伦德（人名）

sentences.english: The hospital agreed to lend us a wheelchair.
sentences.chinese: 医院同意借给我们一把轮椅。

sentences.english: The bank is reassessing its criteria for lending money.
sentences.chinese: 银行正在重新评估其贷款标准。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone borrow money or something that belongs to you for a short time

name: customers
trans: n. 客户；顾客（customer 的复数）

name: practical
trans: adj. 真实的，实际的；（计划、方法等）切实有效的，切实可行的；（人）明智的，务实的；合适的，适用的；心灵手巧的，善于制作（或修补）的；几乎完全的，实际上的
n. <英>（科学、烹饪等的）实践课，实用知识考试

sentences.english: Candidates should have training and practical experience in basic electronics.
sentences.chinese: 应征者应该具备基础电子学方面的培训和实践经验。

sentences.english: the practical problems of old age
sentences.chinese: 老年的实际问题

sentences.english: They provide financial and practical help for disabled students.
sentences.chinese: 他们为残障学生提供经济上的援助以及实际的帮助。

sentences.english: a combination of theoretical and practical training
sentences.chinese: 理论培训和实践培训的结合

sentences.english: They haven’t thought about the practical consequences of the new regulations.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有考虑过新法规会产生什么实际后果。

sentences.english: In practical terms, this means spending more time with each student.
sentences.chinese: 具体地说，这意味着花更多的时间和每个学生在一起。

detailed_translations.english: relating to real situations and events rather than ideas, emotions etc

name: experience
trans: n. 经历，往事；经验，阅历；传统
v. 经历，遭遇；体会到，感受到

sentences.english: The advice in the booklet reflects the practical experience we have gained (= experience gained by actually doing something, rather than knowledge from books etc ).
sentences.chinese: 小册子中的建议反映了我们所获得的实践经验。

sentences.english: I had some experience in fashion design.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些时装设计方面的经验。

sentences.english: She was turned down on the grounds of lack of experience.
sentences.chinese: 她因缺乏经验而被拒绝。

sentences.english: The book is based on personal experience .
sentences.chinese: 本书是根据个人经历写成的。

detailed_translations.english: knowledge or skill that you gain from doing a job or activity, or the process of doing this

name: legal
trans: 【名】 （Legal）（法）勒加尔（人名）
adj. 法律允许的，合法的；与法律有关的，法律的；（与衡平法相对）普通法或成文法确认的；神学律法的，与神学律法有关的；<美>（纸张）标准大小的

sentences.english: What the company has done is perfectly legal.
sentences.chinese: 公司所做的这一切完全合法。

sentences.english: plans to make the carrying of identity cards a legal requirement
sentences.chinese: 使携带身份证成为法定要求的计划

sentences.english: He had twice the legal limit of alcohol in his bloodstream.
sentences.chinese: 他血液中的酒精含量是法定限度的两倍。

sentences.english: a pressure group that is campaigning to make cannabis legal
sentences.chinese: 争取大麻合法化的压力团体

detailed_translations.english: if something is legal, you are allowed to do it or have to do it by law

name: effective
trans: adj. 产生预期结果的，有效的；实际的，事实上的；（法律、规则等）生效的，起作用的；给人深刻印象的
n. 实际可作战的士兵

sentences.english: The cheaper drugs are just as effective in treating arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 较便宜的药品对治疗关节炎同样有效。

sentences.english: the painting’s highly effective use of colour
sentences.chinese: 绘画中得心应手的色彩运用

sentences.english: Training is often much less effective than expected.
sentences.chinese: 训练的效果往往远低于预期。

sentences.english: the most effective ways of reducing inner city congestion
sentences.chinese: 减少旧城区交通拥挤最有效的办法

detailed_translations.english: successful, and working in the way that was intended

name: presenters
trans: n. 发言人；表现者；呈献者（presenter 的复数）

name: contact
trans: n. 联系，联络；接触，触摸；联络人，熟人，社会关系；会见，往来，接触；传染病接触者；隐形眼镜；接通电，触点，接头；（无线电）通信
v. 联系，联络；接触
adj. 供联络的；接触性的，通过接触而起作用的

sentences.english: The town is cut off from contact with the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 小镇与外界的联系被切断了。

sentences.english: Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any queries.
sentences.chinese: 你如果有任何疑问，尽管和我联系。

detailed_translations.english: communication with a person, organization, country etc
to write to or telephone someone

name: audience
trans: n. 观众，听众；读者；觐见，拜见；拥护者

sentences.english: The show attracts a regular audience of about 20 million.
sentences.chinese: 这个节目吸引了大约两千万固定观众收看。

sentences.english: Goya was one of the first painters to look for a wider audience for his work.
sentences.chinese: 戈雅是最早为自己的作品寻找更多观赏者的画家之一。

detailed_translations.english: the people who watch or listen to a particular programme, or who see or hear a particular artist’s, writer’s etc work

name: recession
trans: n. （经济的）衰退（期）；<正式>退后，撤回；（天文）退行；凹处

sentences.english: the economic recession of the early 1980s
sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代初的经济衰退

sentences.english: There is deep recession in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 英国处于严重的经济衰退之中。

detailed_translations.english: a difficult time when there is less trade, business activity etc in a country than usual

name: triggers
trans: v. 引起（trigger 的单三形式）；引爆
n. [电子]触发器；触发物（trigger 的复数）

name: exciting
trans: v. 使兴奋，使激动；激发，引起（excite 的现在分词形式）
adj. 令人兴奋的，令人激动的；惊险刺激的（尤指无法预知下一步将发生什么）

sentences.english: an exciting discovery
sentences.chinese: 激动人心的发现

sentences.english: ‘Julia and Paul are getting married!’ ‘Oh, how exciting!’
sentences.chinese: “朱莉娅和保罗要结婚了！”“啊，太让人兴奋了！”

sentences.english: I’ve got some very exciting news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我给你带来了一些很激动人心的消息。

sentences.english: Let’s do something exciting.
sentences.chinese: 我们来做些让人振奋的事情吧。

sentences.english: Melanie finds her work exciting and rewarding.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉妮觉得自己的工作既刺激又有意义。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel excited

name: rates
trans: n. （Rates）人名；（西）拉特斯
n. 价格；[数]比率；等级（rate 的复数形式）
v. 认为，看做（rate 的第三人称单数形式）；评估；给……估价

name: wisdom
trans: 【名】 （Wisdom）（英）威兹德姆（人名）
n. 智慧，才智；明智；学问，知识；普遍看法

sentences.english: a man of great wisdom
sentences.chinese: 一个有大智慧的男人

sentences.english: You can always expect a few words of wisdom from Dave.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫总能冒出几句至理名言。

detailed_translations.english: good sense and judgment, based especially on your experience of life

name: reporting
trans: n. 报告；报导
adj. 报告的

name: wind
trans: 【名】 （Wind）（英、德、瑞典）温德（人名）
v. 弯曲前进，蜿蜒而行；卷缠，缠绕，绕成团；卷绕（磁带等）；给（钟、表）上发条；转动（把手）；（用辘轳、绞车等）吊起（某物）；使喘不过气来，使喘大气；给（婴儿）拍嗝儿； 嗅出（人，动物）的气味；<文>吹（号角，哨子）
n. 风，气流；风向，逼近的形势；呼吸，呼吸能力；肠胃气胀；管乐器，吹奏乐器；大话，空谈；放屁；弯，弯曲处；一圈，一转；（给钟表）上发条；（由风带来，表明附近有动物、人存在的）气味
adj. 管乐的

sentences.english: The wind blew from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially when it moves strongly or quickly in a current

name: energy
trans: n. 能力，力气；精力，活力；能源；能，能量

sentences.english: Where do those kids get their energy from?
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子哪来这么多精力？

sentences.english: I really put a lot of energy into what I do.
sentences.chinese: 我做起事来总是投入很大精力。

sentences.english: kinetic energy
sentences.chinese: 动能

detailed_translations.english: the physical and mental strength that makes you able to do things

name: increased
trans: v. 增长，增强，增大（increase 的过去式和过去分词）

name: rapidly
trans: adv. 快速地，迅速地

sentences.english: The disease was spreading more rapidly than expected.
sentences.chinese: 疾病的蔓延比预期的要快。

detailed_translations.english: very quickly and in a very short time

name: globalization
trans: n. 全球化；传播，流传，趋同化

sentences.english: the increasing globalization of world trade
sentences.chinese: 世界贸易的日益全球化

detailed_translations.english: the process of making something such as a business operate in a lot of different countries all around the world, or the result of this

name: overwhelming
trans: v. （感情上）使受不了，使不知所措；压垮，使应接不暇；打败，击垮（overwhelm 的现在分词形式）
adj. 难以抗拒的，令人不知所措的；巨大的，压倒性的

sentences.english: There is overwhelming evidence that smoking damages your health.
sentences.chinese: 有难以辩驳的证据表明吸烟有损健康。

sentences.english: An overwhelming majority of the members were against the idea.
sentences.chinese: 占压倒性多数的成员反对这项主张。

sentences.english: The proposal has been given overwhelming support.
sentences.chinese: 这一提议得到了压倒性多数的支持。

sentences.english: The British Air Force succeeded despite overwhelming odds against them.
sentences.chinese: 英国空军虽然处境极为不利，但还是完成了任务。

detailed_translations.english: very large or greater, more important etc than any other

name: phenomenon
trans: n. 现象；杰出的人，非凡的人（或事物）；（哲学）现象

sentences.english: Homelessness is not a new phenomenon .
sentences.chinese: 无家可归已不是什么新现象。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens or exists in society, science, or nature, especially something that is studied because it is difficult to understand

name: ISN
trans: abbr. 信息系统网络（InformationSystemNetwork）；综合业务网（IntegratedServicesNetwork）；国际信令网（InternationalSignalingNetwork）；内码（internal statement number）

name: thorough
trans: adj. 彻底的，全面的；彻头彻尾的，十足的；仔细的，缜密的；仔细周到，工作缜密

sentences.english: The doctor gave him a thorough check-up.
sentences.chinese: 医生给他做了一次全面的体检。

sentences.english: a thorough and detailed biography
sentences.chinese: 详尽的传记

sentences.english: The police investigation was very thorough.
sentences.chinese: 警方的调查十分彻底。

sentences.english: thorough notes of the meeting
sentences.chinese: 详尽的会议记录

detailed_translations.english: including every possible detail

name: insightful
trans: adj. 富有洞察力的，有深刻见解的

sentences.english: an insightful analysis
sentences.chinese: 有见地的分析

detailed_translations.chinese: 有深刻见解的，富有洞察力的
detailed_translations.english: able to understand, or showing that you understand, what a situation or person is really like

name: building
trans: n. 建筑物，房屋，楼房；建筑，建筑业
v. 建造；发展，建立；逐渐增强（build 的现在分词形式）

sentences.english: The offices are on the top two floors of the building.
sentences.chinese: 办公室在大楼最高的两层。

sentences.english: a farmhouse and other farm buildings
sentences.chinese: 农舍以及其他的农场建筑

sentences.english: There is a limited supply of land for building.
sentences.chinese: 建筑用地供应有限。

detailed_translations.english: a structure such as a house, church, or factory, that has a roof and walls

name: trust
trans: v. 信任，相信；对……有把握，信得过；坚信，信仰；希望，盼望；托交，托付；<古>赊账
n. 信任，信赖；（金钱或财产的）信托，托管；受托基金机构，受托团体；代管的财物，托管的财物；公立医院（由政府资助、独立经营）；<美>托拉斯托拉斯，垄断企业；受托，受委任；<文>被托付的人，被赋予的职责；<文>希望，期待
【名】 （Trust）（英）特拉斯特（人名）

sentences.english: At first there was a lack of trust between them.
sentences.chinese: 起初，他们之间缺乏信任。

sentences.english: an agreement made on the basis of mutual trust
sentences.chinese: 在相互信任的基础上达成的一项协议

sentences.english: You betrayed your father’s trust (= did something bad even though he trusted you ).
sentences.chinese: 你辜负了你父亲对你的信任。

sentences.english: I just don’t trust him.
sentences.chinese: 我就是不信任他。

sentences.english: The money your father left you will be held in trust until you are 21.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲留给你的钱将被托管到你满21岁。

detailed_translations.english: a strong belief in the honesty, goodness etc of someone or something
to believe that someone is honest or will not do anything bad or wrong

name: something
trans: pron. 某事，某物；……或诸如此类的东西，……什么的；大致，大约，左右；什么什么（用于表示不记得人名、数字的余下部分或歌词等）；还算幸运的事；重要的人（或事）；（想法或建议）有道理，值得考虑；有点儿，有几分
adv. 稍微，有点；很，非常

sentences.english: There’s something in my eye.
sentences.chinese: 我眼睛里有什么东西。

sentences.english: Sarah said something about coming over later.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉说她等一会儿过来什么的。

sentences.english: I don’t know what he does exactly, but I know it has something to do with computers (= is related to them in some way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他具体是干什么的，只知道和电脑有关。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a particular thing when you do not know its name or do not know exactly what it is

detailed_translations.chinese: 重要的人；值得重视的事

name: achieved
trans: v. （经努力）达到，取得，实现；获得成功（achieve 的过去式和过去分词）

name: overnight
trans: adj. 夜间的，只供一夜的；突然的，一夜之间的
adv. 在夜间，在晚上；突然，一夜之间
n. 一夜的逗留
v. 过夜；<美>连夜快递（货物）

sentences.english: He became a millionaire overnight.
sentences.chinese: 他一夜之间就成了百万富翁。

detailed_translations.english: suddenly or surprisingly quickly
happening during the night or for the night

name: cease
trans: v. 终止，结束
n. 停止

sentences.english: The things people will do for charity never cease to amaze me (= I am always surprised by them ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们的慈善义举总是让我感到惊讶。

sentences.english: The rain ceased and the sky cleared.
sentences.chinese: 雨过天晴。

sentences.english: without cease
sentences.chinese: 不停地，持续地

detailed_translations.english: to stop doing something or stop happening
(it is a noun only in the phrase `without cease') end

name: colossal
trans: adj. 巨大的，庞大的；异常的，非常的；（建筑）（柱型）不止一层柱的，多层柱的；（雕像）至少有真人两倍大的

sentences.english: a colossal statue of the King
sentences.chinese: 国王的巨大雕像

sentences.english: This whole holiday was a colossal waste of money.
sentences.chinese: 这次度假浪费了大量的钱财。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is extremely large

name: renovation
trans: n. 翻新，整修

sentences.english: It often results in lower renovation, cleaning and maintenance costs, too.
sentences.chinese: 它通常还导致较低的翻新、清洁和保养维修费用。

sentences.english: For novice friends, we do not know how much the specific renovation costs?
sentences.chinese: 对于新手朋友来说，大家都不了解具体装修费用是多少？

name: faint
trans: n. 晕倒，昏厥
v. 昏厥；<古>变得微弱，衰落；变得没有气力
adj. 模糊的，微弱的；微小的，可能性不大的；虚弱的，头晕目眩的；不热情的

sentences.english: She gave a faint smile.
sentences.chinese: 她淡淡一笑。

sentences.english: a very faint noise
sentences.chinese: 很微弱的声响

sentences.english: the faint light of dawn
sentences.chinese: 微弱的晨光

detailed_translations.chinese: 模糊的；头晕的；虚弱的；[医] 衰弱的
detailed_translations.english: difficult to see, hear, smell etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 昏倒；变得微弱；变得没气力
detailed_translations.english: to suddenly become unconscious for a short time
an act of becoming unconscious

name: empty
trans: adj. 空的；空洞的，无意义的；空虚的；无知的，愚蠢的；无用的，徒劳的
v. 清空；变空；流入；使失去
n. 空容器

sentences.english: an empty box
sentences.chinese: 空盒子

sentences.english: an empty bottle
sentences.chinese: 空瓶子

sentences.english: an empty space behind the desk
sentences.chinese: 书桌后面的空位

sentences.english: The fuel tank’s almost empty.
sentences.chinese: 燃油箱快要空了。

detailed_translations.english: having nothing inside

name: covered
trans: adj. 有顶的；有一层覆盖物的；投过保的，在保险范围内的
v. 覆盖；包括；掩护（cover 的过去式和过去分词）

name: aspects
trans: n. 方面；方位；面貌（aspect 的复数）

name: enable
trans: v. 使能够，使可能；激活，启动；准许，授权

sentences.english: The new test should enable doctors to detect the disease early.
sentences.chinese: 新的检验使医生能在早期发现该种疾病。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something enables you to do a particular thing, they give you the opportunity to do it

name: improve
trans: v. 康复，健康好转；超过，胜过；提高……的价值；改善，变得更好

sentences.english: a course for students wishing to improve their English
sentences.chinese: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.english: The doctors say she is improving (= after being ill ).
sentences.chinese: 医生说她正在康复。

sentences.english: You could use the money for improving your home.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。

sentences.english: Many wines improve with age (= get better as they get older ).
sentences.chinese: 很多葡萄酒年代越久越香醇。

detailed_translations.english: to make something better, or to become better
to make something better, or to become better

name: employed
trans: adj. 被雇用的
vt. 雇佣；使用（employ 的过去式与过去分词）

sentences.chinese: 我们在乡村长大，周围是美丽的大自然。

sentences.english: nature conservation
sentences.chinese: 自然保护

sentences.english: Disease is nature’s way of keeping the population down.
sentences.chinese: 疾病是大自然控制人口的方法。

sentences.english: I tried appealing to his better nature (= his feelings of kindness ) but he wouldn’t agree to help us.
sentences.chinese: 我想唤起他的善良本性，但他就是不同意帮助我们。

sentences.english: Capitalist society is by its very nature unstable.
sentences.chinese: 从本质而言，资本主义社会是不稳定的。

detailed_translations.english: everything in the physical world that is not controlled by humans, such as wild plants and animals, earth and rocks, and the weather

name: publishing
trans: n. 出版；出版业
v. 出版，发行（书、杂志等）；（作家、 音乐家等）发表（自己的作品），使（作品）出版；（在互联网上）发表（publish 的现在分词）

name: science
trans: n. 科学，科学知识；专门科学；（大学学习的）学科；理科；技术，技巧
【名】 （Science）（英）赛恩斯（人名）

sentences.english: Many leading scientists do not consider that science can give absolutely reliable knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 许多杰出科学家都不认为科学能够提供绝对可靠的知识。

sentences.english: the founder of modern science, Isaac Newton
sentences.chinese: 现代科学创始人艾萨克·牛顿

sentences.english: developments in science and technology
sentences.chinese: 科学技术的发展

detailed_translations.english: knowledge about the world, especially based on examining, testing, and proving facts

name: policies
trans: n. 政策，方针，策略；保险单（policy 的复数）；<苏格兰>封闭的庭院

name: tradition
trans: n. 传统，惯例；传统故事，传说，传统信仰；和著名历史人物有共同品质的人；（神学）圣传

sentences.english: the traditions of South East Asia
sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property
sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.english: By tradition, it’s the bride’s parents who pay for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

name: ensures
trans: v. 确保，保证；保护，使安全（ensure 的第三人称单数）

name: found
trans: v. 找到，找回；发现，发觉；（经过研究）找出，查明（find 的过去式和过去分词形式）
adj. 偶然（或意外）发现的；（艺术）原汁原味的；装备好的；<英>（用餐、供暖）不另外收费的
v. 创办，成立；建造，兴建；根据，以……为基础；熔铸，铸造

sentences.english: Founded in 1935 in Ohio, Alcoholics Anonymous is now a world-wide organization.
sentences.chinese: 嗜酒者互诫协会1935年创立于俄亥俄州，现在是一个世界性的组织。

sentences.english: Eton College was founded by Henry VI in 1440.
sentences.chinese: 伊顿公学于1440年由亨利六世创办。

detailed_translations.english: to start something such as an organization, company, school, or city, often by providing the necessary money

name: small
trans: 【名】 （Small）（英）斯莫尔（人名）
adv. 成小块地；小小地
n. <英，非正式>小件衣服（尤指内衣）（smalls）；后腰（the small of the/sb.'s back）；<西印度>小费，小额礼金（smalls）；小件物品；矮小的人
adj. 小型的；（数量）少的；小规模的；无关紧要的，不重要的；幼小的，年幼的；（字母）小写的；（嗓音）微弱的，轻柔的；一般的，非极端的；出丑的，羞愧的

sentences.english: a small piece of paper
sentences.chinese: 一小片纸

sentences.english: a small car
sentences.chinese: 一辆小汽车

sentences.english: a small town
sentences.chinese: 小镇

sentences.english: a small dark woman
sentences.chinese: 一个皮肤黝黑的小个子女人

sentences.english: The T-shirt was too small for him.
sentences.chinese: 这件 T 恤衫他穿太小了。

sentences.english: The sweater comes in three sizes - small, medium and large.
sentences.chinese: 这羊毛衫有三个尺寸: 小号、中号和大号。

sentences.english: Only a relatively small number of people were affected.
sentences.chinese: 只有相对少数的人受到了影响。

sentences.english: a small amount of money
sentences.chinese: 一小笔钱

sentences.english: A much smaller proportion of women are employed in senior positions.
sentences.chinese: 受雇担任高级职位的女性比例要小得多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 少的，小的；微弱的；几乎没有的；不重要的；幼小的
detailed_translations.english: not large in size or amount

name: profit
trans: 【名】 （Profit）（法）普罗菲（人名）
n. 利润，盈利；<正式> 利益，好处
v. 获益，得益（于）；赢利，获利

sentences.english: The shop’s daily profit is usually around $500.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店每天的利润一般在500美元左右。

sentences.english: She sold the business and bought a farm with the profits.
sentences.chinese: 她卖了公司，用所得利润买下了一座农场。

sentences.english: They sold their house at a healthy profit.
sentences.chinese: 他们卖掉房子，赚了一大笔钱。

sentences.english: There’s no profit in letting meetings drag on.
sentences.chinese: 会议拖拖拉拉没什么好处。

detailed_translations.english: money that you gain by selling things or doing business, after your costs have been paid
to get money from doing something

name: priority
trans: adj. 优先的
n. 优先事项，最重要的事；优先，优先权，重点；<英>优先通行权

sentences.english: The club’s priority is to win the League.
sentences.chinese: 该俱乐部首先考虑的是要赢得联赛。

sentences.english: After several burglaries in the area, security is now a high priority (= very important and needing attention soon ) .
sentences.chinese: 该地区发生了几宗入室盗窃案以后，治安成了当务之急。

sentences.english: With so little money available, repairs must remain a low priority (= not important and not needing attention soon ) .
sentences.chinese: 可用的钱这么少，只好暂时放下维修事宜了。

sentences.english: The customer is high on our list of priorities .
sentences.chinese: 顾客在我们的心目中排在第一位。

sentences.english: List your tasks in order of priority (= most important first ) .
sentences.chinese: 按照轻重缓急列出你的工作。

detailed_translations.english: the thing that you think is most important and that needs attention before anything else

name: agriculture
trans: n. 农业，农学，农艺

sentences.english: More than 75% of the land is used for agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 75%以上的土地用于农耕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农业；农耕；农业生产；农艺，农学
detailed_translations.english: the practice or science of farming

name: poor
trans: 【名】 （Poor）（美）普尔（人名）
adj. 贫穷的；可怜的，不幸的；（身体）虚弱的，衰弱的；不擅长的，不熟练的；劣质的，差的，次的；贫乏的；（数量、比率等）不理想的，不合理的

sentences.english: Her family were so poor they couldn’t afford to buy her new clothes.
sentences.chinese: 她家穷得甚至买不起新衣服给她。

sentences.english: an area where poor people lived
sentences.chinese: 穷人居住区

sentences.english: one of the poorest countries in the world
sentences.chinese: 世界上最贫穷的国家之一

sentences.english: a poor part of Chicago (= where a lot of poor people live )
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥的一个贫民区

sentences.english: My grandparents grew up dirt poor (= very poor ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母在赤贫的环境里长大。

sentences.english: The country is poor in natural resources.
sentences.chinese: 该国自然资源匮乏。

detailed_translations.english: having very little money and not many possessions

name: rural
trans: adj. 农村的，乡村的；有乡村特色的，有乡土气息的

sentences.english: a rural setting
sentences.chinese: 乡村环境

sentences.english: rural bus routes
sentences.chinese: 乡村公共汽车路线

detailed_translations.english: happening in or relating to the countryside, not the city
